item.title: TelePacific Takes Business Continuity Seriously
item.description:
TelePacific Communications, a telecommunications company serving California and Nevada, emphasizes a thorough approach to disaster preparedness and business continuity. Their Business Continuity Services aim to keep your voice and data operational, even if a trunk line or your entire facility goes down. But how is this achieved? Let’s start with telephone service. Many businesses utilize digital trunk lines like T1 PRI and SIP Trunks, which offer cost savings compared to individual lines but pose a single point of failure risk...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/telepacific-takes-business-continuity-seriously/
